name: Station Keeper
description:
You are the station keeper.

Mine resources, upgrade your ship and protect the station from waves of enemy attacks 

This game was made solely by me for the HUJAM22 in 72 hours under the theme "Space".  All external assets used are linked below. Rest of the assets were made by me.

Asteroid Sprites - Pixel Planet Generator by Deep-Fold

Background Music - Space Chase by Romariogrande

Thanks for playing.
